Single file css and js for the following modules

DataTables	-1.10.9
Responsive	-1.0.7
Bootstrap	-3.3.5

-------------------------------------------------
style - datatables.min.css
-------------------------------------------------
bootstrap - dataTables.bootstrap.min.css
responsive - dataTables.responsive.min.js

-------------------------------------------------
javascript - datatables.min.js
-------------------------------------------------
bootstrap - dataTables.bootstrap.min.js
responsive - dataTables.responsive.min.js
datatable core - jquery.dataTables.min.js
